com.zerog.ia.api.pub
Interface ServiceAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomCodeConsoleProxy, CustomCodePanelProxy, CustomCodeRuleProxy, InstallerProxy, UninstallerProxy
public interface ServiceAccess

Method Summary
 Object getService(Class requestedServiceClass)
          Returns an instance of the requested service.
 

Method Detail

getService

public Object getService(Class requestedServiceClass)
Returns an instance of the requested service. You must cast the object returned. It is guaranteed to be the class (or subclass of) the requestedServiceClass. Some planned extensions are Win32RegistryAccess.
